Package org.gradle.api.tasks

Interface ScalaSourceDirectorySet

All Superinterfaces:
AntBuilderAware, Buildable, Describable, FileCollection, FileTree, Iterable<File>, Named, PatternFilterable, SourceDirectorySet
public interface ScalaSourceDirectorySet extends SourceDirectorySet
A ScalaSourceDirectorySet defines the properties and methods added to a SourceSet by the ScalaPlugin.
Since:
7.1
